Having an eye on each palm allows it to keep watch in all directions. In a pinch, its limbs start to act on their own to ensure the enemy’s defeat.
Seven Binacle come together to form one _____. The Binacle that serves as the head gives orders to those serving as the limbs.
_____’s legs and hands have minds of their own, and they will move independently. But they usually follow the head’s orders.
When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven. They fight with the power of seven Binacle.
